item.title: How does R work?
item.description: Before delving into the data and Data structures in R, let’s know, configure and take into account the generalities of the RStudio environment

item.title: What do I need to get started in R?
item.description: To start this adventure, the first thing you need is to install R and Rstudio , without them I think it would be very difficult to start our adventure.

item.title: ... y ahora un poco de teoría!
item.description: We will start by telling you that R is one of the most widely used programming languages in scientific research

item.title: Why did we create this page?
item.description: About us? We are David Vanegas and Eduardo Grajales, two biologists from the University of Quindío passionate about the world of programming and R
